resources.string:
Version: %s

http://www.xelitexirish.com

Scammer bingo is a quick and simple game you can play when a scammer calls you or you call them first. Test them secretly to see how stupid they really are!

Scammer bingo was designed from the Windows version created by Hexxium Creations

Both HexxiumGamingYT, Lewis Tech and WindowsLogic Productions have amazing videos where they talk to scammers, check them all out!
This app is created by XeliteXirish. Visit my website to view my other projects.
